task.name: g.version
task.label: Displays GRASS GIS version info.
task.description: Optionally also prints build or copyright information.
task.keywords: general, support, citing, copyright, version, license

flag.name: r
flag.description: Print also the GIS library revision number and date

flag.name: e
flag.label: Print also extended info for additional libraries

flag.name: g
flag.description: Print info in shell script style (including SVN revision number)
